title: [Self-Directed] Convergence of European Higher Education Systems and Student-Centered Learning (SCL) Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of higher education systems and foundational mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Analyzes standardization trends in European higher education systems and practical applications of student-centered learning (SCL), exploring SCL principles and limitations through mathematical problem-solving processes

learning_goals: Explain the convergence process of the European higher education system and the role of Self-Controlled Learning (SCL).
Apply SCL-based math problem-solving strategies to analyze real-world cases.
Formulate and implement self-directed learning plans in online environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
